entity.name: dataset
entity.query: SELECT d.doi AS doi, d.id AS dataset_id, dc.symbol AS datacentre_symbol, CONCAT(dc.symbol, ' - ', dc.name) AS datacentre, al.symbol AS allocator_symbol, CONCAT(al.symbol, ' - ', al.name) AS allocator, IF(d.is_active, m.xml, NULL) as xml, CONVERT(IF(d.is_active, m.xml, NULL) USING utf8mb4) as parsexml, m.xml IS NOT NULL as has_metadata, m.id as metadata_id, IF(d.is_active, m.dif, NULL) as dif, CONVERT(IF(d.is_active, m.dif, NULL) USING utf8mb4) as parsedif, m.dif IS NOT NULL as has_dif, d.created AS created, d.minted AS minted, MIN(mm.created) AS uploaded, CAST(GREATEST(d.updated, IFNULL(m.created,0)) AS DATETIME) AS updated, m.namespace, d.is_ref_quality AS refQuality, mt.dataset IS NOT NULL AS has_media, d.is_active FROM dataset AS d LEFT JOIN metadata AS m ON m.dataset = d.id AND m.metadata_version = (SELECT MAX(metadata_version) AS max_version FROM metadata AS mm WHERE mm.dataset = d.id) LEFT JOIN metadata AS mm ON mm.dataset = d.id LEFT JOIN media AS mt ON mt.dataset = d.id JOIN datacentre AS dc ON d.datacentre = dc.id JOIN allocator AS al ON dc.allocator = al.id WHERE d.doi not like '20.500.11812/%' AND d.minted IS NOT NULL AND ( '${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR GREATEST(d.updated, IFNULL(m.created,0), IFNULL(mt.updated,0), IFNULL(al.updated,0), IFNULL(dc.updated,0)) > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' ) GROUP BY dataset_id,m.xml,m.id

entity.name: prefix
entity.query: SELECT prefix FROM prefix WHERE '${dataset.doi}' LIKE CONCAT(prefix,'%')
